languages.text: "Позаботься, чтобы у них были маленькие радости. Сладости, игрушки... Они их заслуживают".

traits.locale_text: "Кораблю нужны сильные и здоровые слуги. Улучши питание сирот: включи в постоянный рацион обогащенные протеиновые брикеты, а по праздникам добавляй вяленое мясо грокса".

languages.text: "Make sure they get things that will bring them little moments of joy. Sweets, toys... They deserve it."
languages.original_text: "Позаботься, чтобы у них были маленькие радости. Сладости, игрушки... Они их заслуживают".

traits.locale_text: "Make sure they get things that would bring them little moments of joy. Sweets, toys... They deserve it."
"Make sure they get things that would bring them little moments of joy. Sweets, toys... They deserve it."
"Make sure they get things that will bring them little moments of joy. Sweets, toys... They deserve it."
"Make sure they get things that will bring them little moments of joy. Sweets, toys... They deserve it."
"Make sure they get things that will bring them little moments of joy. Sweets, toys... They deserve it."
"Make sure they get things that will bring them little moments of joy. Sweets, toys... They deserve it."
"Make sure they get things that will bring them little moments of joy. Sweets, toys... They deserve it."

languages.text: « Veillez à leur fournir de petites choses propres à leur apporter un peu de joie au quotidien. Bonbons, jouets... Ils ne l'ont pas volé. »
languages.original_text: "Make sure they get things that will bring them little moments of joy. Sweets, toys... They deserve it."

traits.locale_text: « Veillez à leur fournir de petites choses propres à leur apporter un peu de joie au quotidien. Bonbons, jouets... Ils ne l'ont pas volé. »

languages.text: «Asegúrese de que reciben cosas que les aporten algo de felicidad. Dulces, juguetes, lo que sea... Se lo merecen».
languages.original_text: "Make sure they get things that will bring them little moments of joy. Sweets, toys... They deserve it."

traits.locale_text: «Asegúrese de que reciben cosas que les aporten algo de felicidad. Dulces, juguetes, lo que sea... Se lo merecen».

languages.text: 「小さな喜びを感じられるようなものを与えるんだ。お菓子や、おもちゃ…彼らにはそうしてやる価値がある」
languages.original_text: "Make sure they get things that will bring them little moments of joy. Sweets, toys... They deserve it."

traits.locale_text: 「小さな喜びを感じられるようなものを与えるんだ。お菓子とか、おもちゃとか…彼らはそれに値する」

languages.text: “确保孩子们都能得到让他们开心的东西，比如糖果、玩具什么的。这都是他们应得的。”
languages.original_text: "Make sure they get things that will bring them little moments of joy. Sweets, toys... They deserve it."

traits.locale_text: “确保孩子们都能得到让他们开心的东西，比如糖果、玩具什么的。这都是他们应得的。”

languages.text: "Gebt ihnen Dinge, die ihnen kurze Momente der Freude schenken. Süßigkeiten, Spielzeuge ... Sie verdienen es."
languages.original_text: "Make sure they get things that will bring them little moments of joy. Sweets, toys... They deserve it."

traits.locale_text: "Gebt ihnen Dinge, die ihnen kurze Momente der Freude schenken. Süßigkeiten, Spielzeuge ... Sie verdienen es."

languages.text: "Azıcık da olsa mutluluk verecek şeyler aldıklarından emin ol. Şekerlemeler, oyuncaklar... Hepsini hak ediyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Make sure they get things that will bring them little moments of joy. Sweets, toys... They deserve it."
